results.content: This course went above and beyond! Instructor Sameer thoroughly explained all the steps to creating a working web application with clarity and precision. All sections were easy to follow along, I rarely encountered errors on my own, and I now have basic understanding and foundation of how to create a CRUD web application using ASP NET Core Web API for back-end and Angular for the front-end. Highly recommended!
results.content_html: This course went above and beyond! Instructor Sameer thoroughly explained all the steps to creating a working web application with clarity and precision. All sections were easy to follow along, I rarely encountered errors on my own, and I now have basic understanding and foundation of how to create a CRUD web application using ASP NET Core Web API for back-end and Angular for the front-end. Highly recommended!
